title: Bookends
author: verias
text:
When I found out we were taking a short break between this and the next chapter, I knew I really wanted to do something special to kind of "bookend" this short story, giving just a litttttle more of a hint into how things wind up as we fade to black.

All in all, I'm super happy with this, canon or not, and hope you all enjoy it as well.

Keith W.

replies.author: VoidHamlet*Guest*
replies.text: Have to admit, always nice to see an artist pay respect to the parts of the human(oid) body that get squished when constrained. I'll get back to my lurking now. ;-)

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: The more times i come here to see if there's a new page, the smugger Theresa looks.
